page.title: 19UNITED REFORM CHURCH STROUD
page.content: {Rodborough Tabernacle United {Reform Church { }It stands at the junction of Tabernacle Pitch and Tabernacle Walk near Rodborough Common.The building is of local stone overlooking the valley.Inside there are many interesting features for the visitor.One is the strangely named Treacle Bible,a precious possession,as it is a l538 first translation edition.No-one is at present quite sure how the Tabernacle acquired it but it can be found displayed in a glass case.It apparently is not perfect with one fault inside.The Tabernacle often had visiting preachers as well as the incumbents. The famous preacher,George Whitefield, travelled from Bristol for Evangelical meetings.Today it is also used for playgroups,brownies and drama.
